reviewText: JUST EXCELLENT ! AS WITH THE BEATLES , THESE GUYS TAKE ON ALL STYLES OF MUSIC AND ALSO DELVE INTO THE UNCLASSIFIABLE RANGE . IF YOU HAVEN'T TAKEN THE PLUNGE YET ,THIS DVD OFFERS A GREAT START INTO U2 WHO HAVE ALREADY JOINED THE ELITE PANTHEON OF ARTISTS AS THE ROLLING STONES, LED ZEPPELIN ,THE WHO AND THE AFOREMENTIONED BEATLES . BEST PART ABOUT U2? THEY'RE STILL AROUND,STILL TOURING ,STILL MAKING GREAT INNOVATIVE ROCK MUSIC !!
